column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Well actually this took place about a month ago and we are over the situation
column2: we just definitely won't be going back. Also
column3: I doubt your staff would openly admit to doing anything besides what their supposed to do. Lastly
column4: there were NO social distancing at all
column5: usually you have an empty table between each person and the capacity of the building should be cut in half. I wish I took pictures. If I find the receipt by gods grace I'll definitely post it. I wanted to actually call the day it happened but I decided to drop it.
